statements: SELECT * FROM tournament_prizes;
SELECT tournament_id, prize_money FROM tournament_prizes WHERE prize_money > 1000;
SELECT * FROM tournament_prizes WHERE reward_item = 'Trophy';
SELECT tournament_id, reward_item FROM tournament_prizes ORDER BY reward_item ASC, tournament_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(prize_money) as avg_prize_money FROM tournament_prizes WHERE prize_money > 5000;
SELECT prize_money, reward_item FROM tournament_prizes WHERE tournament_id = 1 ORDER BY prize_money DESC
SELECT * FROM tournament_prizes WHERE prize_money > 1000 AND winner_id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT tournament_id, SUM(prize_money) AS total_prize_money FROM tournament_prizes GROUP BY tournament_id ORDER BY total_prize_money DESC
SELECT DISTINCT winner_id FROM tournament_prizes WHERE reward_item LIKE '%trophy%'
SELECT tournament_id, COUNT(*) AS total_prizes FROM tournament_prizes GROUP BY tournament_id HAVING total_prizes >= 3 ORDER BY tournament_id ASC
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_id, player_id, reward_amount FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_amount DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date FROM tournaments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM tournaments WHERE prize_pool > 100000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100 ORDER BY reward_date DESC
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date, prize_pool FROM tournaments WHERE prize_pool > 5000 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT tournament_name, end_date FROM tournaments WHERE start_date = '2023-01-15'
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_rewards FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_rewards > 1000

SELECT tournament_name, prize_pool, COUNT(*) AS num_rewards FROM tournaments INNER JOIN rewards ON tournaments.tournament_id = rewards.tournament_id GROUP BY tournament_name, prize_pool ORDER BY num_rewards DESC
SELECT * FROM tournaments;
SELECT tournament_name, game_title FROM tournaments;
SELECT tournament_name, game_title FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Cash';
SELECT winner_name, reward_amount FROM winners JOIN rewards ON winners.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE winners.tournament_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tournaments
SELECT tournament_name, game_title FROM tournaments ORDER BY tournament_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(tournament_id) AS total_tournaments FROM tournaments
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Cash'
SELECT winner_name, reward_amount FROM winners INNER JOIN rewards ON winners.reward_id = rewards.reward_id
SELECT * FROM tournaments;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournaments;
SELECT team_name, country FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, role, earnings FROM players WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, reward_description, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.id = player_rewards.player_id;
SELECT * FROM tournaments WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY prize_pool DESC;
SELECT team_name, country FROM teams WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT player_name, role FROM players WHERE role IN ('Support', 'Carry') ORDER BY earnings DESC;
SELECT player_name, earnings FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.id WHERE teams.country = 'Canada';
SELECT player_name, reward_description, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.id = player_rewards.player_id ORDER BY reward_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM tournament;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date FROM tournament WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM player WHERE team_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, country FROM team WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT reward_name, amount FROM reward ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM tournament WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM player WHERE team_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, country FROM team WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT reward_name, amount FROM reward WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY reward_name;
